Key Match Events: Baltimore Orioles won the first game of the series by a score of 13-3.
Chicago White Sox have lost 11 games in a row and 17 of their last 19 games.
Pre-Game Insights: Baltimore Orioles are 40-30 at home, while the Chicago White Sox are 13-54 at home.
The Orioles have a better record (80-59) compared to the White Sox (31-108).
Miscellaneous Highlights: The starting pitchers, Cade Povich and Nick Nastrini, have not performed well this season.
The Orioles have a strong history at Camden Yards, while the White Sox struggle on the road.
